item.title: Curiosities
item.description: I’m a thoroughly miriscient chap, and this often ends up in me creating toys, trinkets, projects and other artistic things. I’m not sure any have a particular purpose. Read more about some of them below. * I created a word to fill a hole in the vocabulary I had to describe my miriscient friends. Read or listen to ðŸ“–the story on medium. * As I travel I like to take 30 second video clips of the peaceful places.
